nodes.text: The Enarc Run was a hyperspace route. The planet Naboo, which was located in the Mid Rim's Chommell sector, was one of the worlds the route passed through.

The Enarc Run was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a map featured in the 2016 StarWars.com article Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?. It was original created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Twin Stars of Kira, a 1993 supplement produced for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games.
